name: Weird Knives
description:
YOU MAKE THE STORY!

Will you be able to both fight and make the right decisions?

Will you be an honest knight or a cruel assassin? OR MAYBE BOTH?!

<<An innovative gameplay with a simple design>> 

Kill dozens of evil, skilled enemies and choose your destiny.

Duck into the decadent county of Quiguinshire ruled by the devilish PRINCE GIOVA and his terrible fellows!

Enjoy relaxing and beautiful medieval music!

Are you ready to fight? Or are you just a sissy?
